options.content: Anomaly Detection Dashboard

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  sum(anomaly_label) AS "Anomaly Count"
  -- COUNT(anomaly_label) AS "Total Records"
FROM
  anomaly_detection.anomaly_detection_score_sdn_2
WHERE
  anomaly_label IN (1,0)
  AND (
    COALESCE('${kube_pod_name:raw}', '') = '' OR kube_pod_name = '${kube_pod_name:raw}'
  )
  AND (
    (
      host_hostname IN ($host_hostname_1) OR
      host_hostname IN ($host_hostname_2) OR
      host_hostname IS NULL
    )
    AND (
      kube_namespace_name IN ($kube_namespace) OR
      kube_namespace_name IS NULL
    )
  );


--   AND time >= extract(epoch from to_timestamp($__timeFrom(), 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS.Z'))
--   AND time <= extract(epoch from to_timestamp($__timeTo(), 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS.Z'))
-- GROUP BY time
-- ORDER BY time

SELECT
to_timestamp(time) as time,
-- kube_node_name,
-- kube_cluster_name,
-- agent_tag_cluster,
-- agent_tag_cluster_type,
-- host_hostname,
-- kube_namespace_name,
-- kube_workload_name,
-- kube_pod_name,
${sysdig_metrics:raw}
FROM
  anomaly_detection.anomaly_detection_score_sdn_2
WHERE 
  anomaly_label in (0,1)
  -- anomaly_label = 1
  AND (
    COALESCE('${kube_pod_name:raw}', '') = '' OR kube_pod_name = '${kube_pod_name:raw}'
  )
  AND (
    (
      host_hostname IN ($host_hostname_1) OR
      host_hostname IN ($host_hostname_2) OR
      host_hostname IS NULL
    )
    AND (
      kube_namespace_name IN ($kube_namespace) OR
      kube_namespace_name IS NULL
    )
  )
  ORDER BY
  time ASC;
-- SELECT 
--   to_timestamp(timestamp) AS time, 
--    ${sysdig_metrics:raw}
-- FROM 
--   anomaly_detection.anomaly_detection_score_sdn_2
-- WHERE 
--   anomaly_label = 1;

SELECT
  median_value AS "Median Values",
  sysdig_metric AS "Sysdig Metric"
FROM
  anomaly_detection.anomaly_detection_univarient_sysdig_metrics_median_values
WHERE
  sysdig_metric IN ($sysdig_metrics);

SELECT
  COUNT(anomaly_label) AS "Total Records"
FROM
  anomaly_detection.anomaly_detection_score_sdn_2
WHERE
  anomaly_label IN (1,0)
  AND (
    COALESCE('${kube_pod_name:raw}', '') = '' OR kube_pod_name = '${kube_pod_name:raw}'
  )
  AND (
    (
      host_hostname IN ($host_hostname_1) OR
      host_hostname IN ($host_hostname_2) OR
      host_hostname IS NULL
    )
    AND (
      kube_namespace_name IN ($kube_namespace) OR
      kube_namespace_name IS NULL
    )
  );

SELECT
to_timestamp("time") AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AS "Time",
 "kube_node_name" AS "Kube Node Name",
"kube_cluster_name" as "Kube Cluster Name",
"agent_tag_cluster" as "Agent Tag Cluster",
"agent_tag_cluster_type" as "Agent Tag Cluster Type",
"host_hostname" as "Host Name",
kube_namespace_name as "Kube Name Space",
"kube_workload_name" as "Kube Workload Name",
"kube_pod_name" as "Kube Pod Name",
${sysdig_metrics:raw}
FROM
  anomaly_detection.anomaly_detection_score_sdn_2
WHERE 
  anomaly_label = 1
  AND (
    COALESCE('${kube_pod_name:raw}', '') = '' OR kube_pod_name = '${kube_pod_name:raw}'
  )
  AND (
    (
      host_hostname IN ($host_hostname_1) OR
      host_hostname IN ($host_hostname_2) OR
      host_hostname IS NULL
    )
    AND (
      kube_namespace_name IN ($kube_namespace) OR
      kube_namespace_name IS NULL
    )
  );

SELECT
  SUM(anomaly_label) AS "Anomaly Count"
FROM
  anomaly_detection.anomaly_detection_score_multivariate_sdn_2
WHERE
  anomaly_label IN (1,0)
  AND (
    COALESCE('${kube_pod_name:raw}', '') = '' OR kube_pod_name = '${kube_pod_name:raw}'
  )
  AND (
    (
      host_hostname IN ($host_hostname_1) OR
      host_hostname IN ($host_hostname_2) OR
      host_hostname IS NULL
    )
    AND (
      kube_namespace_name IN ($kube_namespace) OR
      kube_namespace_name IS NULL
    )
  );

SELECT
  COUNT(anomaly_label) as "Total Records" 
FROM
  anomaly_detection.anomaly_detection_score_multivariate_sdn_2
WHERE
  anomaly_label IN (1,0)
  AND (
    COALESCE('${kube_pod_name:raw}', '') = '' OR kube_pod_name = '${kube_pod_name:raw}'
  )
  AND (
    (
      host_hostname IN ($host_hostname_1) OR
      host_hostname IN ($host_hostname_2) OR
      host_hostname IS NULL
    )
    AND (
      kube_namespace_name IN ($kube_namespace) OR
      kube_namespace_name IS NULL
    )
  );

SELECT
  host_hostname as "Host Name",
  kube_namespace_name as "Kube Name Space",
  kube_workload_name as "Kube Work Load Name",
  kube_pod_name as "Kube Pod Name",
  count(anomaly_label) as "Anomaly Count"
FROM
  anomaly_detection.anomaly_detection_score_multivariate_sdn_2
WHERE
  anomaly_label = 1
  AND (
    COALESCE('${kube_pod_name:raw}', '') = '' OR kube_pod_name = '${kube_pod_name:raw}'
  )
  AND (
    (
      host_hostname IN ($host_hostname_1) OR
      host_hostname IN ($host_hostname_2) OR
      host_hostname IS NULL
    )
    AND (
      kube_namespace_name IN ($kube_namespace) OR
      kube_namespace_name IS NULL
    )
  )
  GROUP BY  host_hostname,
  kube_namespace_name,
  kube_workload_name,
  kube_pod_name
ORDER BY "Anomaly Count" DESC

SELECT
  host_hostname as "Host Name",
  -- kube_namespace_name,
  -- kube_workload_name,
  -- kube_pod_name,
  count(anomaly_label) as "Anomaly Count"
FROM
  anomaly_detection.anomaly_detection_score_multivariate_sdn_2
WHERE
  anomaly_label = 1
  AND (
    COALESCE('${kube_pod_name:raw}', '') = '' OR kube_pod_name = '${kube_pod_name:raw}'
  )
  AND (
    (
      host_hostname IN ($host_hostname_1) OR
      host_hostname IN ($host_hostname_2) OR
      host_hostname IS NULL
    )
    AND (
      kube_namespace_name IN ($kube_namespace) OR
      kube_namespace_name IS NULL
    )
  )
  GROUP BY  host_hostname
  -- kube_namespace_name,
  -- kube_workload_name,
  -- kube_pod_name
ORDER BY "Anomaly Count" DESC

options.defaultContent: The query didn't return any results.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time,
  host_hostname,
  kube_namespace_name,
  kube_workload_name,
  kube_pod_name,
  ${sysdig_metrics_multivariant:raw}
FROM
  anomaly_detection.anomaly_detection_score_multivariate_sdn_2
WHERE
  anomaly_label = 1
  AND (
    COALESCE('${kube_pod_name:raw}', '') = '' OR kube_pod_name = '${kube_pod_name:raw}'
  )
  AND (
    (
      host_hostname IN ($host_hostname_1) OR
      host_hostname IN ($host_hostname_2) OR
      host_hostname IS NULL
    )
    AND (
      kube_namespace_name IN ($kube_namespace) OR
      kube_namespace_name IS NULL
    )
  )
ORDER BY
  time ASC

SELECT
  time as "Time",
  host_hostname as "Host Name",
  kube_namespace_name as "Kube Name Space",
  kube_workload_name as "Kube Work Load Name",
  kube_pod_name as "Kube Pod Name",
  ${sysdig_metrics_multivariant:raw}
FROM
  anomaly_detection.anomaly_detection_score_multivariate_sdn_2
WHERE
  anomaly_label = 1
  AND (
    COALESCE('${kube_pod_name:raw}', '') = '' OR kube_pod_name = '${kube_pod_name:raw}'
  )
  AND (
    (
      host_hostname IN ($host_hostname_1) OR
      host_hostname IN ($host_hostname_2) OR
      host_hostname IS NULL
    )
    AND (
      kube_namespace_name IN ($kube_namespace) OR
      kube_namespace_name IS NULL
    )
  )
    -- AND time >= extract(epoch from to_timestamp($__timeFrom(), 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS.Z'))
  -- AND time <= extract(epoch from to_timestamp($__timeTo(), 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS.Z'))
ORDER BY
  time ASC

panels.title: Sysdig Events & Notifications (DAL us-south production Sysdig)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  count(id) AS "Total Events in last 1 hour",
  "timestamp" as time
FROM
  anomaly_detection.sysdig_events 
GROUP BY timestamp

SELECT
  CASE 
    WHEN COUNT(id) > 1 THEN COUNT(id)
    ELSE 0
  END AS "Total Active Notifications in last 24 hour",
  "timestamp" as time
FROM
  anomaly_detection.sysdig_notifications
  GROUP BY timestamp

SELECT COUNT(name) as "Counts", name as "Name"
FROM anomaly_detection.sysdig_events
GROUP BY "Name"
order by "Counts" desc

SELECT "alertName" as "Alert Name", count("alertName") as "Notification Count"
FROM anomaly_detection.sysdig_notifications 
GROUP BY "alertName"
order by "Notification Count" desc
limit 10;

SELECT scope as "Scope", COUNT(scope) as "Event Counts"
FROM anomaly_detection.sysdig_events
GROUP BY "Scope"
order by "Event Counts" desc

SELECT to_timestamp("timestamp"/1000000) as "Time", kube_cluster_name as "Kube Cluster Name", kube_pod_name as "Kube Pod Name", "alertName", severity
FROM anomaly_detection.sysdig_notifications 
order by severity asc

list.definition: select distinct(host_hostname) from anomaly_detection.anomaly_detection_score_sdn_2  order by host_hostname limit 800;
list.label: Host Name
list.name: host_hostname_1
list.query: select distinct(host_hostname) from anomaly_detection.anomaly_detection_score_sdn_2  order by host_hostname limit 800;

list.definition:
SELECT column_name FROM information_schema.columns 
WHERE table_name = 'anomaly_detection_score_sdn_2' 
AND (column_name LIKE 'fabcon%' OR column_name IN ( 'sysdig_host_net_tcp_queue_len',
       'sysdig_container_net_total_bytes',
       'sysdig_container_net_tcp_queue_len',
       'sysdig_container_memory_limit_used_percent',
       'fabcon_iob_st_stats_DroppedPktsTotal', 'fabcon_nat_DroppedPktsTotal',
       'sysdig_program_cpu_cores_used_percent',
'fabcon_iob_fw_stats_SummaryPortMetricsInsertToHashFailureCounter'))
list.label: Univariate Sysdig Metrics
list.name: sysdig_metrics

list.query: select * from anomaly_detection.anomaly_detection_multivariate_loadings_sdn_1 order by level_0 desc limit 1;

list.label: Kube Namespace
list.name: kube_namespace

list.definition:
SELECT host_hostname
FROM (
    SELECT DISTINCT(host_hostname)
    FROM anomaly_detection.anomaly_detection_score_sdn_2
    ORDER BY host_hostname
    LIMIT 800
    OFFSET 800
) AS subquery
UNION
SELECT 'qz'
WHERE NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT DISTINCT(host_hostname)
    FROM anomaly_detection.anomaly_detection_score_sdn_2
    ORDER BY host_hostname
    LIMIT 800
    OFFSET 800
);
list.label: Host Hostname 2
list.name: host_hostname_2

    ORDER BY host_hostname
    LIMIT 800
    OFFSET 800
);
